Name: Abrix 2 - Diamond version
About the game: Abrix 2 is an addictive puzzle game for everyone. Try over 170 different levels of puzzles and secrets and help Abrix, a tiny toy robot, to find a way out. Abrix 2 is a continuation of a hit game Abrix the robot. Now with new graphics and full of new stuff it's better than ever. Game features: Try 170+ levels with puzzles on different difficulty levels. Use one of several bonuses like: rockets, bubbles, replicators, and many more. Solving puzzles never was so fun before. Save game in the Cloud Steam or sign in with one password for all platforms (HTML 5 and upcoming Android version) The unique soundtrack and available DLC bonus tracks of electronic music composed by Ree-D. All bonuses are now free! No more in-game sales in Abrix! You can play whole game without any payment. If you have any suggestions or found a bug, please let us know it. Let's discuss it on the community pages.
